snippet.title: Magic Defender Level Pack
snippet.description: Magic Defender Level Pack Tower defense game. Prevent the monsters from reacheing the end of the path.

snippet.title: Magic Blaster
snippet.description: Magic Blaster Puzzle game. Use all the magic spells you have to destroy the orks and get the treasure!

snippet.title: Spike Love Story
snippet.description: Spike Love Story You are a spike trap and it is your goal to crush the guy in the game that is running there all days.

snippet.title: Runes and Magic
snippet.description: Runes and Magic Tower defense. Use devices and magical spells to defeat the hordes of attacking enemy units.

snippet.title: Magic Defender
snippet.description: Magic Defender Tower defense. Wipe out the enemy units placing towers along the road. Upgrade to survive!

snippet.title: Magic Balls
snippet.description: Magic Balls Shoot the balls with your cannon. Try to leave only one ball on the board before the time runs out.

snippet.title: Magic Pen
snippet.description: Magic Pen Physics puzzle game. Try to move the ball to the red flag by drawing shapes with your magic pen.

snippet.title: Magic Pen 2
snippet.description: Magic Pen 2 Physics puzzle game. Try to get the red ball to the finish flag by drawing objects and using gravity.

snippet.title: Jungle Magic
snippet.description: Jungle Magic Classic match three puzzle game. Swap adjacent tiles to make matches of three or more.

snippet.title: Hey Wizard: Quest for the Magic Mojo
snippet.description: Hey Wizard: Quest for the Magic Mojo Grab your magic wand, fight dozens of monsters and rescue the king of Mojo.
